message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's worth a lot to you, and I'm willing to start with a price of $120. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
Thanks for your offer, Bob! I understand that $90 is a bit low for me, but I'm willing to compromise. I'd be willing to meet you in the middle at $110. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider $100?
I'm getting close to accepting your offer, Bob! However, I still need to make a bit more profit. I'd be willing to go up to $105. What do you think?
I'm getting close to accepting, Alice, but I still need to save a bit more. Would you be willing to meet me at $102?
I'm getting a bit tired of going back and forth, Bob! But I'm willing to make one more concession. I'd be willing to meet you at $104. This is my final offer, so I hope you'll accept!
I understand that you're making a final offer, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $101?
I'm not willing to go any lower, Bob. I've already compromised a lot. I'm sticking to my previous offer of $104. If you're not willing to meet me there, I'm afraid I'll have to move on.

I understand that you're firm on your price, Alice, but I've reached my limit. I'm willing to walk away if I can't get a better deal. I'll make one last offer: $103. If you're not willing to meet me there, I'll have to consider buying from John.
